definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/summon area_effect_cloud ~ ~ ~ {Particle:{type:snowflake},Radius:5,RadiusPerTick:-0.1,Duration:100,potion_contents:{potion:slowness}}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="world_entity_inrange_foreach"><value name="_placeholder"><block type="entity_iterator" deletable="false" movable="false"></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityLiving</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_iterator"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">FenrirPack</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">6</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"></block></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">FREEZE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">// Congelar agua en un radio de 3 bloques (similar a la bola del Ender Dragon)&#10;BlockPos.betweenClosedStream(&#10;    BlockPos.containing(x - 3, y - 3, z - 3),&#10;    BlockPos.containing(x + 3, y + 3, z + 3)&#10;).forEach(blockPos -> {&#10;    BlockState blockState = world.getBlockState(blockPos);&#10;    if (blockState.getBlock() == Blocks.WATER) { // Congela agua&#10;        world.setBlock(blockPos, Blocks.ICE.defaultBlockState(), 3);&#10;    } else if (blockState.getBlock() == Blocks.LAVA) { // Opcional: Lava -> Obsidiana&#10;        world.setBlock(blockPos, Blocks.OBSIDIAN.defaultBlockState(), 3);&#10;    }&#10;});</field><next><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
